metadata.title: CVE-2023-39270 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple integer overflow vulnerabilities exist in the LXT2 facgeometryparsing functionality of GTKWave 3.3.115. A specially crafted .lxt2 filecan lead to arbitrary code execution. A victim would need to open amalicious file to trigger these vulnerabilities.This vulnerability concernsthe integer overflow when allocating the `rows` array.

criterions.comment: gtkwave package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
